## Description {#details}

Shared implementation of use-lists for replaceable metadata.

Most metadata cannot be RAUW&#39;ed. This is a shared implementation of use-lists and associated API for the three that support it ( <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valueasmetadata">ValueAsMetadata</a></em>, <em>TempMDNode</em>, and <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diarglist">DIArgList</a></em>).

Definition at line 386 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>.

### resolveAllUses() {#a8adfe0bbfa83dcbab95c4bcea9705e9d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void ReplaceableMetadataImpl::resolveAllUses (bool ResolveUsers=<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>)</>}>
Resolve all uses of this.

Resolve all uses of this, turning off RAUW permanently. If <code>ResolveUsers</code>, call <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode/#a36436cf39711f9bf40066439ccfdcced">MDNode::resolve()</a></em> on any users whose last operand is resolved.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h/#l00422">422</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/metadata-cpp/#l00420">420</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/metadata-cpp">Metadata.cpp</a>.

### getOrCreate() {#a368935e053bf74cbccd439e08d77e840}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ReplaceableMetadataImpl &#42; ReplaceableMetadataImpl::getOrCreate (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> &amp; MD)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Lazily construct RAUW support on MD.

If this is an unresolved <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a>, RAUW support will be created on-demand. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valueasmetadata">ValueAsMetadata</a> always has RAUW support.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h/#l00435">435</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/metadata-cpp/#l00456">456</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/metadata-cpp">Metadata.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  labels = {["static"]}>
